28 namespace tesseract {
29 
30 class DawgCache {
31  public:
32  Dawg *GetSquishedDawg(
33  const STRING &lang,
34  const char *data_file_name,
35  TessdataType tessdata_dawg_type,
36  int debug_level);
37 
38  // If we manage the given dawg, decrement its count,
39  // and possibly delete it if the count reaches zero.
40  // If dawg is unknown to us, return false.
41  bool FreeDawg(Dawg *dawg) {
42  return dawgs_.Free(dawg);
43  }
44 
45  // Free up any currently unused dawgs.
46  void DeleteUnusedDawgs() {
47  dawgs_.DeleteUnusedObjects();
48  }
49 
50  private:
51  ObjectCache<Dawg> dawgs_;
52 };
53 
54 } // namespace tesseract
55 
56 #endif // TESSERACT_DICT_DAWG_CACHE_H_
